scripts.test: detox build --configuration ios.sim.debug && detox test --configuration ios.sim.debug --cleanup
scripts.test:ci: detox build --configuration ios.sim.release && detox test --configuration ios.sim.release --cleanup

ios.sim.debug.build: xcodebuild -project ios/e2eTests.xcodeproj -scheme e2eTests -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build
ios.sim.debug.name: iPhone 7

ios.sim.release.build: xcodebuild -project ios/e2eTests.xcodeproj -scheme e2eTests -configuration Release -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build
ios.sim.release.name: iPhone 7
